text:
[Verse]
City lights are flashing bright
Riding high through the night
On a track that never ends
Feel the thrill around the bends

[Verse 2]
Neon skies they paint the way
Lost in moments here we sway
Heartbeat racing in the dark
Chasing dreams within a spark

[Chorus]
Midnight rollercoaster ride
Feel the rush so deep inside
Up and down and round we go
Hold on tight don’t let it go

[Verse 3]
Stars above they guide the path
In the night we share a laugh
Skyward bound we loop and dive
Feel alive we come alive

[Bridge]
Screams of joy fill the air
Wind it blows through our hair
Time it stops in this delight
Glowing in the moon’s soft light

[Verse 4]
Midnight magic in the eyes
Paint the world with fireflies
Gravity it fades away
In this ride we wish to stay
title: Midnight Rollercoaster
